Plot: The story about the relationship between a rebellious 50s teenager and his abusive father, based on the memoirs of writer and literature professor Tobias Wolff.
Title: This Boy's Life
Actors: Robert De Niro, Ellen Barkin, Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Blechman
tomatoConsensus: A harrowing, moving drama about a young boy, his single mother, and his abusive stepfather, This Boy's Life benefits from its terrific cast, and features a breakout performance from a young Leonardo DiCaprio.
